title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 16.4 - Records of articles of manufacture and farm production
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 16.4 - Records of articles of manufacture and farm production

State Regulations
(a) Adequate records shall be kept to reflect
the purchase of all raw materials for the manufacture of articles for use by
the institution or agency, or for resale. Cost of manufacturing, including
labor, burden and administrative expenses and inventory records shall also be
maintained. (b) Accounts shall be
set up to include all costs of farm production, the quantities produced and the
distribution thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง
16.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
